casebody.data:
BOILEAU
v.
SEAGRAVE. No. COA07-1431. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed October 21, 2008. Certification Date November 10, 2008. Appeal from Mecklenburg (05CVS7400).

Case reported without published opinion. NO ERROR as to the judgment entered upon the jury verdict, and the trial court's order denying Plaintiff's Rule 59 motion is AFFIRMED.
